protein.general_function: Involved in armadillo repeat domain binding
protein.specific_function: Binds calmodulin in a calcium dependent manner. May function as scaffolding or signaling protein

reference.reference_text: Castets F, Rakitina T, Gaillard S, Moqrich A, Mattei MG, Monneron A: Zinedin, SG2NA, and striatin are calmodulin-binding, WD repeat proteins principally expressed in the brain. J Biol Chem. 2000 Jun 30;275(26):19970-7.
